page.title: 07A day in the life of Louise
page.content: I wake up at 8 a.m.,wash,get dressed and go down to breakfast.I usually have a fruit juice,toast and coffee.After breakfast I walk to school.I play for ten minutes.When the bell rings I go into school.We do Handwriting until breaktime.The next lesson is Painting.I have my dinner at school.In the afternoon we have Maths and English. There is a short break between lessons.I walk home at 2.45 p.m. I usually watch television until tea is ready.After a tea of biscuits and buns ,I change into my old clothes and go out to play with the friends who live near to my house.My best friend is Rebecca.She goes to the same school but lives in{Haworth.}For supper I have a drink of lemonade and a piece of cake.I help to wash the dishes.I say my prayers and go to bed.
